name: asl-tab-api
description: Get a YouTube channel's video data to use in the ASL Tab browser extension.

scripts.package: rm -f dist.zip && zip -r dist.zip index.js lambda.js node_modules src --exclude node_modules/aws-sdk --exclude node_modules/aws-sdk/\*

author: Matsuko Friedland <info@matsuko.ca> (https://matsuko.ca)
